concept.title: Trending
concept.shortdesc: Use Trending to showcase your most active Collections.

conbody.p: Use Trending to showcase the most active Collections across a given site, to drive site traffic to your most active discussions, or to allow readers to gauge site activity at a glance. The application displays top Collections from most to least active, with a bar graph showing the relative popularity for each Collection displayed. Trending helps readers determine where the most conversations are taking place, and directs them to those conversations.
